issue.title: [Ruby] Add function to list available compute functions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15205](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15205). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We can have something like this
```java

Arrow::Function.all
Arrow::Function.list_names 
```
